import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import styles from './Footer.module.css' import { Field, reduxForm } from 'redux-form' import {required, MaxLength,MinLength} from '../../utils/Validators/validators' import { Input } from '../common/FormsControls/Input' import ErrorMessage from '../common/ServerMessages/ErrorMessage' import SuccessMessage from '../common/ServerMessages/SuccessMessage' const maxLengthCreator30=MaxLength(30) const minLengthCreator5=MinLength(5) const Footer = (props) => { const onSubmitBLL = (formData) => { props.subscribeNewUser(formData.submitEmail) } return (

    {props.errors &&props.errors.id === 'SUBSCRIBER_FAIL' ? :null} ) } const ReduxFormEmailSent = reduxForm({ form: 'submitEmail' })(FormEmail) export default Footer
